page.title: 14EDUCATION: HOME AND SCHOOL
page.content: at eleven o'clock . We work out of maths books that we have. We do maths for an hour till twelve o'clock then we have dinner. After dinner we go on the football field and build grass dens, if the weather is fine. After play we go to games at the Trinity Church hall.We play nonstop cricket and other games.After games we go home.I watch television till five o'clock then I have tea.After tea I go to the motorbike club. I have a 50cc motorbike. I come home at eight o'clock and draw for an hour then I have supper and go to bed. by Daniel Milling
